events.message: I recently purchased a jacket, but it doesn't fit me at all. I would like to return it and get a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's request has been categorized under the Refund cluster for further handling.
An agent has been assigned to handle the refund request regarding the returned jacket.

Thank you for the information. You can send back the jacket within 14 days, and once received, we will issue a full refund to your original payment method.
That sounds fair, thank you for the quick response. I will ship the jacket back today.

Yes, I received the refund today. Thanks for your help, really appreciate the smooth process!
The case regarding the refund request has been formally closed following successful resolution and customer confirmation.
A satisfaction survey has been sent to the customer to gather feedback on their support experience.
